title: Legal Challenges to Biden's Student Loan Relief
itunes:title: Legal Challenges to Biden's Student Loan Relief
description:
Mark Kantrowitz, an expert in student loans and financial aid, discusses the legal challenges to President Joe Biden's student loan forgiveness program.
Professor Carl Tobias of the University of Richmond Law School, an expert in the judiciary, discusses federal appeals court Judge James Ho’s decision to boycott recent graduates from Yale Law School when hiring clerks.
June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
